website_summaries.verdict: The HERO7 Black is the best non-3D camera GoPro makes. It's got every feature available, from 4K 60fps video to compatibility with external microphones. If you're looking for the best action camera on the market, you've found it.
pros: GoPro's advanced image stabilization, "HyperSmooth," really works and steadies any shaky camera work
It's as durable as they come, and the user-replaceable battery means you can bring as many extras as you want
cons: It's pricey when compared to other GoPro cameras
A single battery charge only lasts one to two hours, depending on what type of video you're filming

website_summaries.verdict: The newest version of GoPro's top of the line action cameras includes a stabilization feature to make your videos very smooth.
pros: Doesn't require an extra housing for waterproofing
The hyper-stabilization function produced a nice natural looking smooth video
cons: This camera can be difficult to set up and learn to use

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it for HyperSmooth Alone ! One Major ISSUE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first six hours with this camera were frustrating and I'm a techy. Before you do anything disable WIFI Calling on phone and reboot then download the app and let it update the camera. Life is good after that.
customer_reviews.author: Davinphx

customer_reviews.title: Quite Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 1. Immediately you have to update the firmware. 2. Firmware update requires a microSD card. 3. Did the GoPro come with a microSD card? No, it didn’t . Did they tell me I needed a microSD card? No, they didn’t. 4. Very unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not loving it, impossible to edit footage
customer_reviews.text: not loving the 7. the footage is all but uneditable in my adobe premiere pro. not sure why....looking for resolution for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Camera is not working
customer_reviews.text: I feel disappointed with this item because the camera came deffective. It freezes every couple of minutes while I was trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Gisela Vargas Concepción

customer_reviews.title: Overheated and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: 2nd day using it, the gopro 7 black overheated and won't turn on. Tryed 3 new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best GoPro of the series
customer_reviews.text: Solid feel, extremely good color. Not really a need to color correct in post. Cost: Consider what the original GoPro cost and compare those features against the current (7) features. More features, less cost. Even my $2,000 DSLR can't produce (out of the camera) a quality image as good at this GoPro Hero 7 produces.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brent

customer_reviews.title: Unworkable  - Locks up a LOT!
customer_reviews.text: Had Since September. Tried various cards, updates. All kinds of settings. Locks up; gets scary HOT! Must pull out battery to halt heat build up and reset. Gave it 3 frustrating months of trying to work with it. My 2 G5's work no problems and my G4 is a work horse.. For me this 7 has been a "Crap Out".
customer_reviews.author: Mike HNL

customer_reviews.title: Battery won’t charge. Firmware won’t update.
customer_reviews.text: Battery won’t charge and the firmware won’t update. Returning it! IF i buy it again and have a better experience, maybe I’ll change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very terrible battery, like less than an hour terrible.
customer_reviews.text: For an adventure camera, it sure does not allow m uch time for an adventure. A full charge will not even last me an hour, and that is powered off until I want to take a shot. So disappointed since i only ordered just in time for an epic adventure and I cannot get it to stay charged long enough to capture much of anything.
customer_reviews.author: robi

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with the connection between my phiand camera but resolved it after an hour. The camera heat's up and may have to return it and get a replacement because of it. The battery doesn't last long. Overall an okay sports camera that is probably more hype. Never owened previous models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible battery life, OK pictures
customer_reviews.text: First GoPro and do not like this. Bought for diving and picture quality is very blurry even when on dry land. The battery is horrible. Took two 5-minute videos and then it died. When charging the battery, the device gets extremely hot. I thought it was going to burn a hole in my table. Ordered a replacement, but haven’t used it yet. Return process is also terrible. I had to take it to an actual UPS store and PAY to ship it back. What a waste of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware — does not work out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a present for my daughter on Christmas. She had asked for it and was very excited — until discovering that you need a micro SD card for the product to work, which is not included. Incredibly frustrating. It does not say this anywhere in the product description, and there is no warning that a separate purchase is required. In my opinion, base version of a product should work out of the box. GoPro should be ashamed at this packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Chase J. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: It gets really hot above 50C after 10 minutes of use. Many times it fails to turn on, you need to remove the battery and put back in, eventhough i have the latest software and resetted the camera. Timewarp and Hypersmooth are great new features!
customer_reviews.author: Fadi Tohme

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reviews
customer_reviews.text: First the pluses: tiny size and great picture resolution especially when shooting at a speed that includes image stabilization. Negatives include being getting it out of it's protective case where I have to pry open the snap release with a small screwdriver it's so hard to open. Next, the camera will suddenly freeze during video and there's nothing that I've been able to do to correct it. The instructions say to hold the "mode" button in for 10 or 15 seconds to reset the camera, but I haven't found that to work. At this point, to make the camera useable I remove and re-insert the battery which sets everything back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: pdq

customer_reviews.title: Stabilization is phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the best gopro’s ever made the STABILIZATION IS PHENOMENAL. My only gripes are the lowlight video quality which is not that great and there is a weird jitter in videos when panning left to right from what I read this is because of the new stabilization technology, hopefully there is a software fix for this soon.
customer_reviews.author: kev6677

customer_reviews.title: Freezes
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter saved her money for months to buy this camera. Her excitement turned to disappointment pretty quickly when she discovered the camera will freeze on her. Taking the battery out would unfreeze it but for the cost of this item it should work correctly. After reading several internet blogs about others having the same issue we returned the camera and exchanged it for another. Sadly the replacement camera had the exact same freezing issue. So camera is being returned and this time we just want our money back and no replacement. Shame on GO Pro for selling a product that clearly was not fully tested before being released.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley L Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Love it and hate it too. But love it more.
customer_reviews.text: Well I’ve not really got to play with it a lot but so far I love it. The battery life sucks but that’s what all gopros do as I’m finding out. I wish I would of had more info on the memory cards I would of needed. I ended up getting one that will not last as long as the battery. So heads up you want a card to last get a 120 gb card. I got a 32 gb and I can only record like a hr before it’s full.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry m.

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies, even when not in use
customer_reviews.text: The battery can be charged to 100%, you turn the wifi off, gps off, voice control off, and the camera off, and by the morning the camera is dead. After doing some research on GoPro forums, it seems this "battery drain when off" problem is a common issue with more than just my camera, and all GoPro can tell us to do is update the firmware (already done), and to turn wifi, gps, voice off (already done). My guess is it is bad software and I hope they can fix it soon, but for now I'm planning on returning my GoPro until they get their act together.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Garn

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This gopro7 is junk! I used the HD setting and After our travel I plugged it on my pc and all the video's are corrupted, can't download it and even play it. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: RNBI0MD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful images but pans poorly
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional videographer who films off-road vehicles from inside and out. I have three other "action cameras" but I bought this GoPro 7 Black for the HyperSmooth feature. In fact the HyperSmooth works very well if you're traveling in a forward direction (like on skiis or on a motorcycle). But unfortunately it works horribly for panning horizontally. It lurches and makes every horizontal pan unusable because it'll lurch, or stall, every four seconds. MANY other users are suffering the same result, and it's not because of a too-slow flashcard or from an obsolete OS.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marcos Studios

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera but there's two reason make me disappointed 😒 first one the battery die so fast so quick and the second is there is nowhere you can't charge it or replace the battery unless you take out the cover. Now here's the problem the case is made with hard plastic and it's too tight it takes me two minutes to figure out how to take out the camera from the cover I have to push the camera with my fingers from all the corners so I can take out the camera GoPro please fix that case cuz we can't use it without the case cuz if it's drops will break right away.
customer_reviews.author: Fares

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a camera expert nor have I owned a gopro before, but I'm more tech savvy than your average person. I could not get the camera to pair with my phone. Tech support hung up on me. I've been dealing with this thing for 2 hours. I mean come on. I have a modern android phone and this is the top of the line gopro. Disappointing. I don't even want to think about dealing with this thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take on dives. It's perfect!!! I was seriously considering spending A LOT more on what I thought would be a better camera with housing. I am so glad I didn't waste the money. This is PERFECT!!! Battery life isn't so great, so buy a back-up. I didn't have an issue diving with it though. I have it on the mode where it wakes it up when you hit the shutter and start recording video and when you hit the shutter to stop the recording it turns it off. I actually bought the book about it and skimmed through and learned all I needed to get started. :)
customer_reviews.author: gypsywillow

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars isnt an option so rounding up for the great features it has for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had a rough start, package had no instructions in it, connecting to the phone was full of hickups, but overall so far its got more features and functionality than I could ask for and is quite a step above previous gopros. 4.5 stars isn't a rating so rounding up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The Hypersmooth stabilisation is really nice not till the extent that it will actually replace the gimbal but it does a really good job. On top of this, the new hyperlapse feature is so good that it used to take years to master how to make a time lapse stable and now it literally takes less than a day. The new microphone is also decent. However, the low light performance is quite bad due to the small sensor. Battery life is also not that long so an extra battery is highly recommended. Overall, a great sports camera to have and I certainly recommend to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: We used our GoPro Hero 7 Black on our last trip to Disney World, and after returning from our trip and reviewing our footage, we are extremely happy with the video and audio quality. This includes walking around, swimming in the pool, on rides, and for other scenic shots. The biggest challenge for this camera has to be capturing photos and videos in low light settings, and also the huge draw this camera puts on the rechargeable batteries. But these are minor compared to all the positive features of this camera. Overall we absolutely love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: dsurgo

customer_reviews.title: Freezing, bad battery, unable to edit footage.
customer_reviews.text: That's really it. Title says it all. Returned after about 5 days of trying to edit the footage. Camera was constantly freezing. I hope they fix the problem, because the quality of footage is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: On 1st use, camera got extremely hot. During review of video, discovered that camera had stopped recording video due to malfunction. Removed camera, removed the battery (which was very hot) and let it cool down. Installed a fresh battery and experienced same overheating, shut down issues. For all the advertising hype and market share, this is a major disappointment! These same symptoms (overheating and shutting off) are well documented and is a relatively common problem with this model (GoPro Hero 7 Black). I went against my better judgement and ordered it. Before you make the same leap of faith, check out reviews!
customer_reviews.author: marspogo

customer_reviews.title: Problem getting hot and seizing up
customer_reviews.text: Received this GoPro as I was leaving for a trip to St. Lucia. 1st time using the camera to would seize up and not allow me to cycle through the options or turn off. I noticed the longer you used the camera the lense would get very hot. I will need to contact GoPro Customer Support which, I have never had to do. I have numerous other GoPros and this is my first problem I’ve had. I would still recommend this item as I believe this to be a rare problem......I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review After Owning For More Than a Year - Needs Some Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Camera overheats after 10 minutes of using 4k...I had it mounted on my motorcycle, and it still overheated with high velocity wind moving past it. When it overheats, it starts to glitch and has a hard time turning off and on. When replaying footage captured during the day, I can see that It will occasionally have a "stuttered" capture during filming randomly in 4k. The GoPro app does not work well with an Android phone, and have a really hard time trying to connect it with Bluetooth and Wifi. When it works, it's great, but there is always going to be an issue. This model needs some serious updates, or improvements. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera but...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the resolution of the videos and the app is super easy to use but at night time the resolution can be blurry depending on the lighting. Also I noticed that the battery would lose charge overnight so I started to pay more attention to it in the evening hours. After observing this thing, it turned on 8 times on its own after I shut it off multiple times. Every time it would start recording on its own without me touching it or telling it to. Very creepy. Maybe there’s a defect? I am going to exchange it but when it worked, I was really impressed with it just not at night.
customer_reviews.author: Ada C

customer_reviews.title: Go Pro improve some things but take steps backwards in others
customer_reviews.text: As of this review I own 19 Go Pro cameras models all the way from 3 Silver to the 7 Black. The big improvement with the 7 Black is the IS which does work well but just on 1080 HD recording, not on 4K. The battery life has not improved and the ability to connect an external mic has become so poor that I just use Go Pro 4's for that. Go Pro 7 needs the very poorly made Go Pro external mic adapter ( I own 2 of them) which only sometime can see that an external mic is attached and of course you don't know until you get home and find the sound is messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Murray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to configure and to carry around.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle and very hd capture. On the previous model tapping the currently selected presets would open up the settings page where you could clumsily navigate to make changes. It was cumbersome, and there was almost no customization available, The Hero 7 swings the other way, and the new Hero 8. I can tell they improved the software, and turned out a camera that's better for action-cam and the trending of blogging.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Has been a headache since we bought it. Intermittently shuts off for no reason. Videos corrupted often. Frequently come home to find out nothing recorded. Often get only the first few seconds of video, then the rest is only the audio. Many wasted trips/events with no footage gathered. I have tried different SD cards all from their 'compatible' list. Would never buy again. GoPro customer support is not helpful. When we do get video, the stabilization is amazing and the quality is beautiful. So sad how many memories we've missed relying on this for video.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: DOA - 'NO BATT' - GoPro Known Defects
customer_reviews.text: DOA - "No Batt" SO FRUSTRATING!!!!! Googling, one sees that GoPro has been shipping DOA cameras for a minimum of 5 months. I dont believe for a SECOND that GoPro is unable to identify the quality issue here. GoPro support is sending me a new battery AFTER hearing symptoms I described, THEN having me repeat procedure I JUST described to them. You cant patch the firmware without a charged battery. You can use the camera, if you are willing to risk damaging the usb port walking around with a line hanging out. The GoPro knockoff I earlier bought, Akaso, Brave 4, worked PERFECTLY out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: MaasSql

customer_reviews.title: Overheat!
customer_reviews.text: Image quality and Hypersmooth is awesome, the only problem I've been having is overheating, it'd overheat on long recording and shut down even in 50F outdoor temperature, it even gets hot while charging, I have to set the camera on a piece of heat sink just to be safe. Another issue is firmware update, it was impossible to do the upgrade through the phone app, I had to download file from GoPro website and do manual update, hope these issues can be fixed on future firmware. Other than that, it's an awesome camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H

customer_reviews.title: Is it on?
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this Gopro. When I really needed it to record, it did not. When I don't need it to record, it would, and I would discover a dead battery with a video of 2 hours of darkness. Main Stupidity: There is really no way to be confident that this thing is recording especially in bright daylight (at 5500ft altitude). I will give it 1 star for taking a video at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: I love gopro but didn’t like the 7.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used gopro for a very long time. Recently been using my gopro hero 6 black for literally everything. Mostly to record string ensembles perform at events actually. I wanted to try the 7 but didn’t feel it was that amazing compared to my 6. I messed around with the image stabilization and i guess I hoped it would be more smooth. Nonetheless I’m still a gopro fan, love how compact they are. The battery life in the 7 may be a little better than my 6 but nothing significant. I also found that the gopro 7 would randomly crash while filming in 4K.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Camera is great, but defective software that even GoPro support cant fix
customer_reviews.text: So the camera itself records great and does what it's supposed to but it seems as several of them have a software defect that drains the battery completely to 0% from 100% overnight (yes, even with the voice command and wifi off). GoPro seems to have no solution for this fix and just sends you a battery as a "sorry for the inconvenience". I know you can just leave the battery outside the unit, but if i'm paying $300 for a camera, why do I, the consumer, have to worry about that? Best part is that my fathers unit is perfect and doesn't die overnight. Returning, and might just get the DJI. THANKS GOPRO
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first action camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my first action camera. I bought this camera to capture some of the outdoor adventures my wife and participate in and I think it's going to be great. So far, all I've done with the camera is attach it to my mountain bike and go for a ride. Based on that video, the new image stabilization is amazing. I was jumpinmg over logs and up and down curbs and the video was smooth as silk. I am anxious to get this camera rigged on my kayak and film some kayaking which will be happening soon. bottom line, I don't think you can go wrong with the new Hero 7.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E East

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera despite a few drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Best GoPro ever. The image stabilization made my$250 gimbal obsolete. Fine by me! Battery life sucks so buy some 3rd party extras. They are just as good or better than the GoPro batteries for a fraction of the cost. Software/firmware needs updated. Sometimes it won't turn off and touchscreen inputs don't register. Frustrating when you are missing an awesome shot. It's surprisingly hard to get the camera in and out of the mounting shell, like they didn't do great QC on that part. Even with the draw backs the camera is amazing
customer_reviews.author: DutchyMontana

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - back screen stopped working when that happens it's worthless
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine when I got it, I packed it in a case and when I took it back out a couple of month's later, the back viewer screen didn't work at all. When that happens you can't we connect the continuously disconnecting WIFI, which renders the camera useless. Really disappointed at the options and support on this camera. I expected it to be more user friendly. IN this day and age most products are. So surprised at how cheesy it is.
customer_reviews.author: jazzopie

customer_reviews.title: Own both GP7 & Osmo Pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I own both GoPro Hero 7 Black and the DJI Osmo Pocket. GPH7 is better for action camera, I used it for swimming, diving, ATV, waterfall jumps, motorbike rides, horseback rides, basically any activities that are more physical and outdoor environment. Where as the Osmo Pocket is more for Vlogging (hence the 24mm isn't wide enough) but it is much easier to control with 180degree rotation, vertical shooting for instagram stories, and easier to take out without having to attach to another extension like the GoPro7.
customer_reviews.author: JLong

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Hero 7 Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Bought the GoPro for my husband for Father’s Day. What a awesome gift ! The camera is compact and takes amazing pictures and videos. Took it running and we were pleasantly surprised to see how stable the picture was while running. Took it paddle boarding and dropped it in the water and it was fine once retrieved. It didn’t not come with a lot of extras, like a tripod or any accessories for the camera. The owners manual doesn't contain any information on how to use the camera. I downloaded the owners manual by googling for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hagan

customer_reviews.title: This is my 5th GOPRO
customer_reviews.text: I upgrade every time there is a worthy step forward made. HYPERSMOOTH is totally worth it, nice to not need to bust out the $500 gimbal for every film. Others have mentioned and I'm experiencing it too... camera gets pretty hot after continual use. Battery life seems similar to previous generations. Stoked so far
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R. French

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Camera, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: the livestream function SUCKS. Hard to setup, IF connection of wifi or hotspot is there with GoPro7 it sometimes just randomly drops out and you have to start all over setting up livestream. VERY unreliable feature and "false advertising". If you're looking for 4K videos and some pics - great, but NOT a good camera for livestreaming.
customer_reviews.author: texas12345

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, set up can be a bit clunky
customer_reviews.text: Received my GoPro last night, Camera came right on with no issue. However, when setting up camera and updating it seems to have a bit of problems. After going through the set up I would get errors when updating. I had to do a factory reset and go through the whole process again to finally get it to update. Other than that GoPro delivers as always. Great video and pictures, camera is fast - it does run a little hot but I've had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: If you can possibly afford it get the Black!
customer_reviews.text: Hyper smooth stabilization is remarkable! We filmed in our vehicle and it was as if a 3 axis gimbal was involved! Fast, responsive, microphones works great with reduced wind noise. Menu well laid out and pretty much idiot proof! Trust me! I’m no expert but know quality when I see it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: No Support from GoPro Plus
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good, the customer service is horrible. GoPro outsources their support by the quality of service I’ve received Update: customer service has actual gotten worse, the support team for GoPro is horrible. If I were to give my customers this type of customer service, I would have no customers. Update nothing from Customer Service. They suck @GoPro you should be ashamed of yourselves Gopro’s customer service sucks stay away from their products Buy a Sony
customer_reviews.author: Brian R Williams

customer_reviews.title: If you are still thinking about it, don’t.  Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Everything that has been advertised met my expectations by far. Image stabilization is amazing, and live features are great. Best GoPro yet!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Milla

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED: BAD PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with gopro. I've had and loved the hero 4 for years, since it came out. Only bought this because of the image stabilization. BUT THE CAMERA PERFORMANCE IS TERRIBLE. GETS STUCK ALL THE TIME, THE SYNCING WITH THE PHONE SIMPLY DOESN'T WORK, DOESN'T HAVE VIDEO + PHOTO, AND THE BATTERY SLOT IS NOT 100% WATERPROOF.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lousy documentation.
customer_reviews.text: Our first cruise vacation was my excuse to finally buy one... wish I’d done that sooner! The image quality, color fidelity, and stabilization are absolutely superb; after a while my partner just left his camera on the ship and we only used this! We did both still photos and video, and used it for sightseeing, hiking, horseback riding, and snorkeling. The Apple iOS apps made downloading, editing, and saving a breeze. The only criticisms are that it could be better in low light, and the documentation is terrible (thank you, YouTube!). Still, it’s a great product, and I can’t wait to use it in my airplane this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Matelski

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for husband a few months ago for his birthday. He was so happy . He loves it ! Defiantly takes some time with how to use it. Battery life is not the best but I purchased the charger with 3 other batteries so it’s a must if you purchase this
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Ruined by terrible Android App.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot update the camera on a LG G6 or a Samsung S8. Fix your garbage application. I don't have a way to manually put the update file on an SD card either so now you want me to pay money to fix this incompetence? Why cannot you put the update on the GoPro's SD while the SD card is inside? Terrible application and dumb decisions.
customer_reviews.author: Steven N

customer_reviews.title: Family camera
customer_reviews.text: Got it to record kids while playing home or doing outdoor activities.. .the voice control is great .waterproof .quality is good and I only use the gopro and quik app to edit videos .It is smooth but probably not as good as a gimbal though I wanted something super small, easy to carry and hide .I dont like taking pictures with it, my pixel 2 does an Amazing job for that .kids ending up playing with it (often) and making interesting/funny videos :)
customer_reviews.author: can.i.tell.you.something

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome latches
customer_reviews.text: Ok, by all means hyperlapse and stability were what we were waiting for. Con: it’s cumbersome to change battery and you can’t change the sd card without removing the battery. I just feel like there could have been something a tad less tedious than messing with these door latches. ALSO had some strange times right after purchase where the unit would start on its own (VC off) and it would wear down the battery and get pretty hot. Ver. 1.61 fixed that (I hope)
customer_reviews.author: Atxdj

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after got wet
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and the second time I was filming our youth football practice which it started to rain towards the end of practice. Then about 10 minutes into it started noticing the camera was going in and out. After practice when I got home tried to turn it back on and it wont power back up. I know this is a great product because I have 3 other which are older and they still work awesome. So I'm not sure what happened but 10 minutes of rain which it started raining pretty hard should not have been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: kevin coffey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, use it all the time as a b-roll camera and just for fun. It makes photography fun again. Only downside is that the display is very small, so I have to put on reading glasses to see what I'm doing. Stablization is overrated. I recommend a Karma grip as well for a gimbal. Good sound quality, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: David Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with absolute garbage if a software on it.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera hardware. And and absolutely terrible software. The damn thing glitches out all the time, from not being able to shut off to capturing wrong modes, and often taking forever to start...its all there. Still thinking about returning it, but my friend has the same model and it has the exact same issues so this is just a terrible software and QA on GoPro part and not just one off glutchy device.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is faulty. It will NOT recognize the battery. I tried everything to get it to work. Then I dig deeper online, its a KNOWN issue and they are still selling them! I really wish I had done more research before buying. GoPro is having some real issues as a company. Shame on them for not recalling this product and fixing it. No wonder they are headed for bankruptcy. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: hry89n

customer_reviews.title: Shit Battery life, and support.
customer_reviews.text: At 1080p, or 2k at 60fpv the battery last about 30min of recording time. If it's set to 4k it's 15min. I have tried turning off any feature I can think of that consumes battery life to get just a few extra minutes and it still fails. Plus when I try to submit a ticket to Gopro I hear nothing back soooo.... what gives.
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Careful, cameras can be intended for sale outside the US and will it work with the app.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was intended for sale in India, not the US. The camera worked fine, but I’m not sure if it was refurbished or new. The software was not compatible with the GoPro app and getting it to work was impossible. The box came with a sticker that said GoPro India but I didn’t made anything out of it until I tried using the app. Needless to say, I returned the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilio

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It definitely lives up to the hype, I haven't yet tested it in water a little afraid to lol. But overall the picture is amazing and I love the voice control feature. The only thing is, I wish the UI was easier to use, I dont like that you have to basically use an app on your phone to do a lot of the stuff. A $300 camera shouldn't need to rely on the phone as much as it does for its features. But can't wait to take this baby to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A. Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than older versions.
customer_reviews.text: I like the touch screen to control the camera functions. It's simple to use compared to my Hero3 Silver. Accessories that support my Hero 3 work on the Hero 7. It does use different batteries and waterproof cases. It will only take 171⁄2 minutes of video on a battery, so if your driving and wish to capture more you have to stop and take it out of the holder to replace the battery. So if you want to take extended videos you'll need alternate power sources. I still would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: John Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Glitchfest by GoPro
customer_reviews.text: The display, the picture quality, the stabilization is all great. But there's no use in all that if the camera is unreliable. It constantly overheats and shots down even when it's not in direct sunlight. When it doesn't overheat it randomly gives you SD card errors. I was planning to use it for recording hummingbird feeders action, but you can't rely on it, so I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: The H7B does what everyone is saying it does!
customer_reviews.text: I have used gopro's for a few years - right out of the box this one surprised me with the ease of use screens and the image stability. Maybe its just me but I think its way easier to use than the H5B that I have (from the touch screen) the camera looks the same fits right in to all of my accessories ... and then we tried the image stability.. phew! awesome... and the timewarp mode works great... I cant wait to see what the time lapses... the only flaw is the plastic case and how it covers the microphones... but there are fixes for that... AHHH finally "THE camera I have been waiting for!" :-)
customer_reviews.author: michael a vassily

customer_reviews.title: A big beast in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I shoot high energy commercial promos and this is a game changer! Hyper lapse, hyper smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my GoPro 3+ with this Hero 7 Black and what a huge improvement. The camera is beautifully made, has metal hinges, materials are gorgeous and quality, and the video is wonderful. I can now shoot underwater video using the 2.7k and it goes full screen and gorgeous on my iMac. I am so glad I upgraded. And today I got a 256 Gb card for $69, wow. I can see how even though I have a full Nikon D800e and Nikon lenses I will be using this camera a ton above water too. It is so Swiss watch beautiful and convenient too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Stabilization is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: A little nervous after reading about many problems other people have had, but mine has worked flawlessly. The Hero 7 Black image stabilization has dramatically improved the quality of my video. I shoot a lot of quick hand-held videos of my family (frequently while chasing my daughter on foot) and everything looks so much than with my Hero 5.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Winger

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend this camera
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is really good and even the microphone recording is clear, but the main problem is that the battery doesn’t last more than 10 minutes, you can’t have it connected while recording so that is ridiculous and the worst is that the battery discharge even when the camera is off !!
customer_reviews.author: Ron ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding feature packed camera.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this camera. The stabilization is flawless, the video quality perfect for my business, and the ease of use with voice activation is a wonderful addition. The Hero 7 Black has significantly reduced my dependence on my DSLR's for motion videography. Considering the features and quality, this little powerhouse is a tremendous value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brown

customer_reviews.title: No Card
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Hero 7 Black. I am sad and angry that it doesn’t come with the SD card! It is rendered useless without one. Doesn’t make sense to me. Grrrr. Anyways, once I get the card in my next order, I can then experiment with it. I am thinking it will be great. Other than not having the card, I am happy how quick it came and all the features I will have available. Hopefully I can post an update - unless I need a card for that. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use spot metering ...
customer_reviews.text: it appears you actually have to tap and hold on the back screen of the gopro to enable spotmetering. in other words, you can't do it from the app on the phone... It also doesn't retain the setting after rebooting the camera. This is far from idea for example if you're trying to film from inside a car where the interior is much darker than the outside. Otherwise, i felt it was very easy to use with great video quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Chicoine

customer_reviews.title: Best camera yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best go pro! The video and picture quality is phenomenal and the hyper smooth is breathtaking! I really don’t like that I can’t download 4K video on my phone. I know that has nothing to do with the camera but it’s something I’d like to know before buying. So if I want to share video and pics I have to change quality down to 1080. Definitely don’t regret buying though. Hypersmooth is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: A_Ron21

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before you buy Action Cameras
customer_reviews.text: Take this if you travel a lot and do a lot of adventurous stuff If you are just a regular traveler, i believe your smartphone (like iPhone 11 ) can do a great job capturing 4k videos . This is for those who do adventurous stuff like zip lining , rafting , skydiving etc . You could carry it to your hikes as well but the battery may not last as long as you wish . Issues : heats up very quickly Battery life is poor when you record 4k videos .
customer_reviews.author: Prabhava

customer_reviews.title: Love the image stabilization
customer_reviews.text: Electronic gumball is a good way to explain how the Hero 7 Black image stabilization works. My shots are always very shaky. The Hero7 Black has taken much of the shakiness out. I would definitely buy it again based on my experience. The things I didn't like were the awkward form factor. I'm a huge fan of the session form factor. The additional size and weight makes it a bit clunky compared to the session. The battery seemed to not last as long. It's easy to swap them out, however so this isn't much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Very good with only a couple reservations
customer_reviews.text: This is the best GoPro yet. The picture quality and especially the in camera stabilization are excellent. There are only a couple reservations, but they are not deal breakers. This is an excellent camera. I do feel the battery life is too short and the operation is confusing. Hopefully these will be worked on in future editions. In the meantime, I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Eerdmans

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Video Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Takes amazing videos. Used for skiing in various conditions. Chews through batteries so stock up. We would go through 3 batteries during a 4 hour outing on the slopes. Also, buy the largest SD card as recording in 4K makes for large files. If you have an internal SD card reader on your computer or laptop videos download quickly. If you do by USB they will take a while.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buehler

customer_reviews.title: It takes good video and photos while it worked ?
customer_reviews.text: After using it once it would not power on again ! I tried another battery fully charged, I tried plugging in in with the charging cord. changing the card . I went to you tube and tried all the things they recommended to get it back on, nothing worked. Am going to try another one ! The one time i took video it worked great !
customer_reviews.author: G. F. T.

customer_reviews.title: The stabilization is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: * Camera is well built. * Video quality is great (in daylight) Cons: * Low light is still an issue. * the casing doesn't cover the screen and the lens, so it might break if it falls face down on a solid surface.
customer_reviews.author: UltimateDreamZz

customer_reviews.title: 30 day warranty? mine dead out of box but opened on day 40!
customer_reviews.text: $300 dollars down the drain ..... GONE.. i had no idea warranty / return period is 30 days!! i didn't even use the damn thing until like day 40 or 45 .. .and was inop! i have like 4 other go pros... i know how to use them... have countless videos over the years... but this is a joke! $300 dollars? maybe i should post a video of me smashing the crap out of it with a hammer .... shame on Gopro !! such high margins - crap support!! shame!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Teacher Live Videos
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good quality camera that could capture action without lagging. I teach power yoga and do live videos on Facebook. This makes it SOOOO easy to go live. I just hit live on the app and control where it streams to on my phone. It's also great for capturing videos for my website as well so students can watch on-demand videos of quality! The quality is so good, my boyfriend plans to use it when he goes to racing events and placing it on his helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Might be worth it?
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this to make art videos, I’ve had trouble getting it connected to my iPhone, and in order to get the most out of it, you’ll want to buy accessories. It’s fairly easy to set up and according to many reviews I watched this version was the best for what I needed it for (Beats out the 8 for low lighting)
customer_reviews.author: Ohitsjustnick

customer_reviews.title: Overheating problem kills the experience.
customer_reviews.text: Let’s be clear: everything is good when it works. But it just doesn’t work often and long enough: battery is ridiculously low, especially when skiing (cold) and in hot days, the camera overheats extremely fast. When filling in 4k@60, it shuts down because of overheating after just 15min. Wait for gopro8 or buy DJI.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Chinese crap.
customer_reviews.text: Chinese junk. You never know if the thing is recording or what it is recording. There’s no way to see what it sees if you have it mounted to a helmet etc. The phone app is buggy and resets randomly. The menus are deep and random and confusing. Don’t expect to get any usable video out of it.
customer_reviews.author: TimH

customer_reviews.title: Best GoPro ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the GoproHero7 black, The Hyper-Smooth stabilization and Super Photo mode were the main reasons I purchased this camera and I am glad I did. It seemed that the battery was a problem in the beginning but after the second update I haven't had any problem with the battery. I love the quality of images and the stabilization of the videos. Keep it up GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Simeon

customer_reviews.title: Stabilization, voice control work excellent.  Battery life just ok. (Buy extras)
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ‘Voice control’, makes it a lot easier to start/stop recording and turn it off.Ω The stabilization is quite good. I would like a slightly narrower angle of view (I’ve been using the Sony, which has that option) but the 2.7k with ‘Linear’ selection and stabilization is pretty good. Battery life at those settings is not wonderful. But similar to the Sony, so I’m not sure there is much to be done at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus54

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera but virtually no instructions
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this thing for a couple of days and have high hopes for it. Initial test is great. I will see when I edit my first video. The only thing I didn't like so far is the fact that there was virtually no instructions in the case except for a small picture instructions with almost no useful information on it. I had to search the internet and Youtube to find good information.
customer_reviews.author: Marc D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for my motorcycle while riding and this thing fits the bill. Video quality is amazing, app is fairly simple. I've noticed when uploading some of my videos it's not in chronological order which is really annoying. Battery life is trash but that's similar to other reviews I've read. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daytona 675R

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is very popular product. I found it is amazing for action videos. Picture or Image quality is so so. Decent product. I have yet to use it under water and so I can not comment on it yet. Design problem is I have to open up the frame to Replace battery or MicroSD card. There has to be a better way to design this product or the frame for ease of doing things.
customer_reviews.author: KRN

customer_reviews.title: Best action Camera period
customer_reviews.text: This is my first action camera and I love it. The only down side is the low light quality is terrible. The electronic stabilization in low light doesn't works so if you want to record in low light you better use a gimbal.
customer_reviews.author: Rafy Vega

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the money
customer_reviews.text: Did concept is great but the electronic functions of the camera have so many flaws... sometimes doesn’t shut off so it drains your battery ... that requires you to spend money on lots of extra batteries... it acts likewise off but is still on and if you pull your SIM card out you loose your filming ... overall is just an ok camera ... the sound is not great either
customer_reviews.author: Enrike

customer_reviews.title: for winter sport in cold weather ...4K + hypersmooth just wouldn't work
customer_reviews.text: 4k/2.7k + hypersmooth stop working less than a min at low temperature if u have a gopro hero 5 or 6...there is no need to upgrade at all because at the end ur just going to able to use the 1080p without hypersmooth to keep ur gopro7 running i just came back from Japan Niseko i was snowboarding there for 14 days temperature was around 3 to 10'C everyday my gopro hero 7 blk just wouldn't work at all.... every clip has sound only....and the video stuck on the frame
customer_reviews.author: Rocky TANG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Thanksgiving Deal!
customer_reviews.text: We got this GoPro in a bundle that includes extra battery, dual battey charger, and 64gig memory card. I'd say it's an awesome deal considering the unit alone costs higher in the store. Quality wise, we love how this model is captures more stable videos and correctly colored pictures. We also used it while skiing in Tahoe and the videos were awesome. Battery lasted long contrary to the reviews that it drains sooner at freezing temperatures. Unless you're a pro and needs an action cam regularly, given the big price diff with the newest version(8), this one is good enough for an average user and can capture almost the same quality for a more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Cherryl

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Has new features, that make it way better than the 4, I bought the 6 but was dissapointed in the image quality, this one looks better, but for a good review go watch some on youtube, even owning one, I couldnt say that its better than a xiaomi yi, but, I bought it, because of the built in water resistance, other than that do your research, to me its overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Fabio J. S

customer_reviews.title: Best GoPro yet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had multiple GoPros since the first one, the 7 Black is by far the best quality build to date and easiest to use, not to mention it’s streamline process in retrieving photos and videos directly on my phone. Battery life is always an issue with anything, especially 4k video, at least extra batteries are cheap if you sign up for Plus+ for a month 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not good for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: I thought it’d be a better camera with good quality, I wanted it to record at the gym but the video quality was really fuzzy and reallly bad because of the lack of natural lighting, I was also shooting in 4K but it looked like 480p, I immediately sent it back and got a low-mid range dslr and it was sooooo much Better. I like the idea of having a small recording device with me at the gym but I guess not what it’s for. Did not try it for outdoor use so I wouldn’t be able to tell ya. Just not good for recording indoors or night time
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this GoPro
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned every generation of GoPro since the first hero came on the market... and I’m very disappointed in the Hero 7 black. Mine has a major flaw, either in the sensor or inside the lens. A vertical crease runs down the middle of all my footage and my pictures. I also get very blurry footage from time to time which I’ve never had a problem with in the past from my other GoPros . If your looking for a cheaply made camera, this is your best bet. Quality has really declined with GoPro over the years.
customer_reviews.author: eastwood30

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is god awful. I would like to motovlog, however it can record continuously for ONLY 45 minutes before the battery dies. You also require a proprietary mic adapter from gopro, which has been out of stock since BEFORE THE CAMERA CAME OUT. Does not look like GoPro plans on restocking the big, bulky mic adapter anytime soon either. Very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hassler

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Action Camera with Removable Battery.
customer_reviews.text: A very durable high quality action camera with removable battery. Have gotten some great video and still photos from this camera. The removable battery truly is important to extend field time. With three batteries I don't miss any action. Have not had it under water yet so will update when I do. Gaskets are effective however against driving rain.
customer_reviews.author: lang

product_meta.title: GoPro Hero7 Black — Waterproof Action Camera with Touch Screen 4K Ultra HD Video 12MP Photos 720p Live Streaming Stabilization
product_meta.description:
Style:HERO7 Black| Configuration:Base PackageGoPro Hero7 - Meet Hero7, the perfect camera for adventures big and small. It’s built tough and totally waterproof—just grab it and go for it. Smooth 4K video and vibrant WDR photos make every moment look amazing. GPS lets you track how fast, high and far you went (1). With an intuitive touch screen, it’s simple to jump right in and get great shots. Plus, your photos and videos move right to the GoPro app for easy sharing (2). From beach days to vacays to good times with the family—capture your life in a fresh new way with Hero7. 

4K60 Video - Get stunning 4K video that’s as amazing as the moment itself. You can also shoot time lapse videos to turn longer events into short, shareable moments. 

Rugged + Waterproof - Share experiences you can’t capture with your phone. Hero7 is tough, tiny, totally waterproof—and up for any adventure. 

Intuitive Touch Screen - With a touch screen and simple, streamlined capture modes, it’s easy to jump right in and get great shots. Just swipe and tap. 

Voice Control - Stay in the moment. Control your Hero7 hands free with voice commands like “GoPro, take a photo” and “GoPro, start recording.” 

12MP Photos With WDR - Hero7 Black takes beautiful, vibrant 10MP photos—even in challenging shots that mix bright light and shadows. And with Burst mode, you can get 15 photos in one second. 

Video Stabilization - Adios shaky footage. Hero7 Black records smooth, steady video whether you’re skiing, snorkeling or chasing your dog around the yard. 

Shoot Vertically - Capture photos and videos in portrait orientation—perfect for your Snapchat and Instagram Stories. 

Photo Timer - Jump in there. A photo timer makes it easy to grab a GoPro selfie or group shot with your whole crew in the frame.
feature_bullets: HyperSmooth: Get gimbal‑like stabilization—without the gimbal. HERO7 Black corrects for camera shake to deliver insanely smooth footage
TimeWarp: Capture super stabilized time lapse videos while you move about a scene. Increase the speed up to 30x to turn longer activities into shareable moments
Live streaming in 720p: Share while you’re there. Live stream in 720p on social, get HyperSmooth stabilization as you broadcast via the GoPro app and save footage to your SD card to check out later
Rugged + Waterproof: Share experiences you can’t capture with your phone. HERO7 Black is rugged, waterproof without a housing to 33 feet (10m) and up for any adventure
SuperPhoto: Get brilliant photos automatically. With SuperPhoto, HERO7 Black intelligently applies HDR, local tone mapping or noise reduction to optimize your shots

Voice control: Go hands-free with 16 voice commands like “GoPro, take a photo” and “GoPro, turn on.” Understands English (US, UK, AU and India), Chinese (Mandarin), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (BR), Russian & Spanish (EU and NA)
4K60 Video + 12MP Photos: HERO7 Black shoots stunning 4K60 video and 12MP photos that are as awesome as the moments themselves
8x Slo-Mo video: With ultra-high frame rate 1080p240 video, you can slow things down by up to 8x to relive funny, interesting or epic moments in all their glory
Intuitive touch screen: If you have a smartphone, using HERO7 Black will feel familiar; three main capture modes with streamlined settings make navigating easy
Includes GoPro warranty when purchased from an authorized reseller (see technical specification section below for additional details)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,321 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
